title: Handle a Shipment Discrepancy
description: A receiving clerk received a shipment where the quantity is less than what was on the packing slip.

tasks.description: Record the actual received quantity against the purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the physically counted quantity in the system.

tasks.description: Create a 'Discrepancy Report' detailing the PO number, part number, expected quantity, and actual quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a formal report for the discrepancy.

tasks.description: Notify the procurement department so they can contact the supplier to resolve the short shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent forwards the report to the responsible buyer.
